page.title: API Documentation
page.description: Integrate AI Assistant with your application. Access tender analysis results through our REST API.

auth.title: Authorization
auth.description: All API requests require a key. Pass it in the header

page.copied_description: Code has been copied to clipboard.

results.title: Results List
results.description: Returns a list of tender analysis results with basic information (name, organization, submission deadline).
results.detailed_description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve paginated tender analysis results. You can filter results by date, limit the number of returned items, and control whether to include historical results.
results.use_case: Use to display results table and filter by date.

criteria.title: Evaluation Criteria
criteria.description: Detailed analysis of criteria fulfillment for a specific tender with scoring.
criteria.detailed_description: Retrieves complete analysis of how a given tender was evaluated according to defined criteria. Each criterion contains a score, AI confidence level, justification, and information about whether it's disqualifying. This data allows you to understand why a tender received a specific score.
criteria.use_case: Use to display detailed analysis of why a given tender received a specific score.

files.title: Tender Files
files.description: List of documents related to the tender (specifications, requirements, attachments) with preview option.
files.detailed_description: Returns a complete list of all documents downloaded for a given tender. Each file contains a download link, size, and optional preview of the first content fragments. Documents are automatically downloaded and analyzed during the tender evaluation process.
files.use_case: Use to display list of downloadable documents and their preview.

overview.step1: Add authorization header with API key
overview.step2_get: Replace result_id with real result ID
overview.step3: You will receive data in JSON format
